name: Very Rapid Application Design & Develpmt
short_description: V.R.A.D.D. (Very Rapid Application Design & Development) is a free framework for *very* quickly building rich applications to run on (at least) Windows, Linux, and Macintosh, as either/both desktop applications, and/or remote (web-based/server) services.
